channel.title: Code on Mr. Eric
channel.description: Recent content in Code on Mr. Eric
channel.copyright:
Welcome to study, discuss, even debate together.
No plagiarism please, because simply copying, even only one word, even only one minute, will waste time in our life. While copying, you use other’s opinions, but yourself don’t have one.

item.title: An Alarm Clock
item.description: Many personal computers, laptop computers, tablets, and smart phones have applications that allow a user to set reminder alarms. To accomplish this, all these applications use date and time functions that are built into the language they are programmed in.
